answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hello,
I found a few documents and links that should prove useful: 

Communications Manual from the City of Delaware, OH discusses the role of the Community Affairs Coordinator in helping coordinate and manage media relations for the council members. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/14780/Communications_Manual
Media and Communications Manual from City of Virginia Beach, VA provides a description of the Media and Communication Group and outlines its role and services. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/12503/Media_and_Communications_Manual
Job description for the position of “Executive Support/ PIO/ Economic Development” that reports to the Mayor/ City Manager’s office, from the city of Herriman, UT. The essential functions include acting as principal City spokesman, preparing marketing and advertising products and so on. 
http://www.herriman.org/employment/docs/Executive_Support.pdf
A job description for the “Mayors’ Executive Assistant/ Program, Coordinator” from Rapid City, SD. Duties include creating press releases and planning public information events. http://www.rcgov.org/pdfs/Human-Resources/Job%20Descriptions/MayorsExecutiveAssistantProgramCoordinator.pdf 
A description of the Mayor’s office and his support staff from the City of Danbury, CT 
http://www.ci.danbury.ct.us/content/21015/22147/default.aspx

I hope this is useful,
Pooja Varma 
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is interested in learning your support levels for Mayor/Council with regard to communications and public relations.  Job descriptions for those staff that support elected officials in these two areas would be very helpful.
Thank you!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Communications & Public Relations Support - Mayor/Council
